channel.title: How do i turn into a monster or creature
channel.description: can somone tell me the id to do that?

item.title: How do i turn into a monster or creature
item.dc:creator: @breaking_the_bridge breaking the bridge
item.description:
@breaking_the_bridge wrote:

Ok first you get MoparScape 3.2 w\ Aryan up, then you got to the help tab on the top of the page of the MoparScape page and then you click on “NPC Id’s” option and it will bring up a side menu that you can choose the monester you like. For an npc you type this on MoparScape: ::pnpc [NPC-ID]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn into a monster or creature
